item.title: Untaxed and abandoned car, 20th July
item.description:
This car is parked in a limited-space cul-de-sac car park, and shows signs of abandonment. Signs include missing front registration, cracked window, rubbish dumped inside car, scratches over exterior of car and when you look up the registration (still on boot of car) it says it’s untaxed since March 2025. It’s taken up space in a very limited space car park, please remove so residence and use the space again. This car has been here for a while.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Vista, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 21 church row, 20th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Church Row, West Hampstead, London

item.title: Dead fox - bagged, 20th July
item.description:
I’m a wildlife rescue volunteer who was called to an injured fox but it had sadly already died. Double bagged and outside 52 Orchard Rise West.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Orchard Rise West, Falconwood, London

item.title: Dead fox, 20th July
item.description:
Dead fox outside number 52 on orchard rise west. A volunteer from Greenwich wildlife network came out and checked fox over. Confirmed dead and bagged up. They have left the black bag outside number 52
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 54, Orchard Rise West, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging vegetation on narrow pathway on the bridge on Brampton Road, Bexleyheath, 20th July
item.description:
Vegetation will only grow deeper/longer if not dealt with. It is causing an obstruction on the narrow pathway which is very close to the road with fast moving traffic. A danger to pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brampton Road, Welling, London

item.title: Utility Manhole Cover Trip Hazed, 20th July
